      • findMinResources

        public int findMinResources(int alpha,
                            java.util.List<java.util.List<Vertex>> p)
        Finds the minimum number of resources needed to achieve minimal latency. Uses Hu's theorem
        Parameters:
        alpha - Maximum label among vertices.
        p - The vertices, grouped according to their labels.
        Returns:
        The lower bound on resources needed.
